title: Primary Familial Brain Calcification Treatment Guidelines
short_description: Clinical document discussing treatment approaches for Primary Familial Brain Calcification (PFBC), focusing on symptom management and off-label medication use.
long_description: This clinical document provides information about treatment strategies for Primary Familial Brain Calcification (PFBC), a rare neurological condition. The document emphasizes that no specific cure exists for PFBC, but outlines symptomatic treatment approaches including medications for managing associated conditions such as movement disorders, seizures, anxiety, depression, psychosis, and urinary incontinence. It also mentions the off-label use of bisphosphonates in a limited number of patients, referencing clinical studies from 1998, 2006, and 2017.
